ygData.subject: Just a little frustrated
ygData.msgSnippet: I am getting tired of some of the groups i ve been in recently. i guess it wasnt so bad before because i could solo well and there arent that many creatures u
ygData.messageBody:
I am getting tired of some of the groups i ve
been in recently. i guess it wasnt so bad before
because i could solo well and there arent that many
creatures u hunt in groups that take a lot of
thought.<br><br>Well now i have started grouping and it seems in
finding more people who were either power leveled or
leveled by quests(i.e. DF belts in FP and Bone Chips in
Kaladim). Yes this is a great thought for getting through
the earlier lvls but.....<br><br>Reasons why this is
bad:<br><br>1: If it is ur first char. then you really dont
learn how to play him. Youn need to learn how to
survive and learn your limits of what you can and cant
do.(also if its you ve never played the class before id
also recomend playing Vs pwr lvling)<br><br>2: I was
grouped with a guy at the treants, i pull and go in and
all i see is fizzle, fizzle, fizzle, fizzle.......
50%of his mana burned in fizzles before he got the
spell off and put alot more of a burden on me. The
players ive seen so far that have lvld this way, you can
tell. They suck at thier skills(unless theve taken out
ALOT of time just to work on them)<br><br>I guess all
im saying is at later lvls you dont want to put
other players at risk cause of lack of experience. Yes
sure everyone hates being a newbie and wants to get
out of that stage ASAP but it is there for a reason:
to help you learn your char. and how to play
them.<br><br>I am only level 25 but i got thier by my self and i
feel that is an accomplishment. I am just trying to
inform people of the consiquences of the "easy way." I
hope that as i reach the later levels that i will see
this less and less. I m trying to bitch but their will
probaly be a lot of u who read this that will take it
like that but oh well. Email me with
comments.<br><br>Cireno De'Tenebrae<br>House
Kenafin<br>Brell<br>Cireno82@...<br>Cireno@...<br><br>(note: if u feel u must level this way then take out
time when u get to where u want to be to make sure ur
skills are up to par. If not for ur sake then for the
sake of others)
